description: Heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in CX-Programmer Included in CX-One CXONE-AL[][]D-V4 V9.80 and earlier. By having a user open a specially crafted CXP file, information disclosure and/or arbitrary code execution may occur.

enisaIdProduct.product_version: Included in CX-One CXONE-AL[][]D-V4 V9.80 and earlier
